alert.note: Alert for James City; Surry (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 09 at 7:50AM EDT until September 10 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Around foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Surry and James City Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is expected in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline resulting in a low threat of property damage. Expect up to one foot of water above ground level in low lying, vulnerable areas. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks and lawns near the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. JAMES RIVER AT SCOTLAND/JAMESTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 4.5 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/11 AM 3.9 1.7 1.7 1 NONE 10/12 AM 4.3 2.1 1.8 1 MINOR 10/01 PM 3.9 1.7 1.5 1 NONE 11/01 AM 3.7 1.5 1.3 1 NONE 11/01 PM 3.5 1.3 1.1 1 NONE 12/01 AM 3.4 1.2 1.1 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
